name: VOIDSCAPES 4 LIFE BABY
description:
hallo hallo hallo

When I started this project, my main goal was to just experiment and make weird stuff. I wanted to use games as a form of art and share the project with others.

My goal was to make 3 empty but “interactive” environments/spaces (voidscapes) with each their own theme. 

During the development of this project the overall theme evolved to: “a filled void”, which each of the games had in common. The project began to acquire a deeper (maybe personal) meaning, despite being an experimental project at first.

The first one means isolation, everything around you is chaotic emptiness.

The second is filling the void on your own way and terms, others can be a big part in this.

Last but not least, the third is about acceptance and calm, but there will always be an endless void in the background.

how to play:

Mostly with just the mouse and sometimes the space bar. From time to time you need the esc button to close the application or open up the menu. 

hit me up if you like it :) 

buh bye <3
